generated_description: hurst industrial boilers, also known as hurst boiler and welding company, inc., is a manufacturer of gas, oil, and hybrid fire-and-water tube steam boilers. they offer a range of boilers, including scotch marine boilers and biomass boilers in various sizes, as well as boiler auxiliary equipment, parts, and service. the company also provides hot water hybrid condensing systems, feedwater systems, and integrated control systems. hurst industrial boiler is based in the united states and offers a plant tour for interested customers.
